au.gov.sbr.core.requester.model
Class Request

java.lang.Object
  au.gov.sbr.core.requester.model.Request
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestInterface
public final class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestInterface

This class inherits the Request interface class so it can be build an SBR core service message ready for transmission.
